text: XHUMI-FM is a radio station serving Torreón, Coahuila owned by the Universidad Millennium Internacional. It is branded as Radio Millennium and broadcasts on 101.9 FM from its campus. ==References== ==External links== *Radio Umi 101.9 Facebook Category:Radio stations in the Comarca Lagunera Category:Radio stations in Coahuila Category:Mass media in Torreón Category:University radio stations in Mexico
title: XHUMI-FM
